General.Name: Shenzhen Kedali Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Kedali Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of lithium battery precision and automotive structural parts. The company also provides auto parts assembly services. Its products are used in various industries, such as automobiles and new energy vehicles, portable communications and electronic products, electric power tools, and energy storage power stations. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Ms. Lijiao  Luo
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
